modules.title: The Genesis of Lego: From Wood to Plastic

topics.title: Overview
topics.description: Course introduction and objectives.

topics.title: Ole Kirk Christiansen: The Early Years
topics.description: The life and times of the Lego founder and the initial wooden toy designs.

topics.title: The Invention of Automatic Binding Bricks
topics.description: The development and initial patenting of the Lego brick system.

topics.title: Early Lego Sets and Marketing Strategies
topics.description: An examination of the first Lego sets and how they were marketed to children and families.

topics.title: The Transition to ABS Plastic
topics.description: Why Lego switched to Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) plastic and its impact on brick quality.

topics.title: Early Engineering Concepts
topics.description: Introduction to fundamental engineering concepts demonstrated by early Lego designs.

topics.title: Patents and Intellectual Property
topics.description: An overview of the patents that protected the Lego brick design.

topics.title: The Lego Name and Brand Identity
topics.description: The origin and evolution of the Lego brand name and its core values.

topics.title: The Modulex Brick
topics.description: A look at the smaller, scaled-down version of the Lego brick intended for architectural models.

topics.title: Influence of Post-War Design
topics.description: Examining how the Lego brick was influenced by post-war design and manufacturing principles.

topics.title: The Toy Industry in the 1950s
topics.description: A historical context of the toy industry during the time Lego was emerging.

topics.title: The System of Play
topics.description: Introduction to the Lego System of Play concept.

modules.title: The Lego System of Play: Standardization and Interconnectivity

topics.title: The 2x4 Brick: The Cornerstone
topics.description: Why the 2x4 brick became the standard and its significance in the Lego system.

topics.title: Tolerance and Precision in Manufacturing
topics.description: The incredibly tight tolerances required for Lego brick interconnectivity and manufacturing processes.

topics.title: Studs and Tubes: The Clutch Power Mechanism
topics.description: The engineering behind the stud-and-tube coupling system and its role in brick stability.

topics.title: Material Science: ABS Plastic Properties
topics.description: Detailed analysis of the physical and chemical properties of ABS plastic and its suitability for Lego bricks.

topics.title: The Evolution of Brick Design
topics.description: How the Lego brick design has evolved over time while maintaining interconnectivity.

topics.title: Modular Design Principles
topics.description: Application of modular design principles in the Lego System of Play.

topics.title: Standardization and Interchangeability
topics.description: Why standardization and interchangeability are critical to the Lego experience.

topics.title: The Role of Color in Lego Design
topics.description: The psychology and engineering aspects of color choices in Lego bricks.

topics.title: Ergonomics of Lego Bricks
topics.description: How Lego bricks are designed for easy handling by children and adults.

topics.title: The Lego Foundation and Education
topics.description: The mission and impact of the Lego Foundation in promoting learning through play.

topics.title: Lego Patents Expire
topics.description: The impact of the expiration of Lego's patents on the toy industry.

topics.title: The Minifigure Revolution
topics.description: The introduction and impact of the Lego Minifigure.

modules.title: Lego Technic: Mechanical Engineering in Miniature

topics.title: The Introduction of Lego Technic
topics.description: The origins and evolution of the Lego Technic line.

topics.title: Gears: Types and Applications
topics.description: A comprehensive overview of different types of gears used in Lego Technic models and their specific applications.

topics.title: Levers and Linkages: Basic Mechanisms
topics.description: Understanding levers and linkages and their role in creating complex movements in Lego Technic models.

topics.title: Pneumatics: Compressed Air Systems
topics.description: Exploring the use of pneumatics in Lego Technic models to create realistic and powerful movements.

topics.title: Electric Motors: Powering Lego Creations
topics.description: The integration of electric motors in Lego Technic models and their impact on functionality.

topics.title: Structural Integrity and Load Bearing
topics.description: Principles of structural integrity and load bearing in Lego Technic designs.

topics.title: Gear Ratios and Torque
topics.description: Calculating gear ratios and understanding the relationship between torque and speed.

topics.title: Computer-Aided Design (CAD) for Lego
topics.description: Using CAD software to design and simulate Lego Technic models.

topics.title: Building Instructions and Design Documentation
topics.description: Analyzing Lego Technic building instructions and understanding design documentation.

topics.title: Real-World Applications of Lego Technic Principles
topics.description: Examples of real-world engineering applications that mirror Lego Technic principles.

topics.title: The History of Mindstorms
topics.description: An overview of the Lego Mindstorms system.

topics.title: Lego and Robotics Competitions
topics.description: The role of Lego in robotics competitions such as FIRST LEGO League.

topics.title: Introduction to Lego Mindstorms EV3
topics.description: An overview of the Lego Mindstorms EV3 platform and its capabilities.

topics.title: Programming with EV3-G
topics.description: Learning the basics of programming with the EV3-G visual programming language.

topics.title: Sensors: Touch, Color, Ultrasonic, Gyro
topics.description: Understanding the different types of sensors available for Lego Mindstorms and how to use them.

topics.title: Motors: Controlling Movement and Speed
topics.description: Controlling motors in Lego Mindstorms to achieve precise movements and speeds.

topics.title: Data Logging and Analysis
topics.description: Collecting and analyzing data from sensors to improve robot performance.

topics.title: Advanced Programming Techniques
topics.description: Exploring advanced programming techniques such as loops, conditional statements, and functions.

topics.title: PID Control: Precision Movement
topics.description: Introduction to PID control for achieving precise and stable movements.

topics.title: Remote Control and Teleoperation
topics.description: Controlling Lego Mindstorms robots remotely using Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.

topics.title: Path Planning and Navigation
topics.description: Developing algorithms for path planning and navigation in Lego Mindstorms robots.

topics.title: Computer Vision with Lego Mindstorms
topics.description: Introduction to computer vision techniques using Lego Mindstorms and external cameras.

topics.title: Lego Spike Prime Overview
topics.description: An overview of the Lego Spike Prime system.

topics.title: Python Programming with Spike Prime
topics.description: Introduction to Python programming with Lego Spike Prime.

topics.description: Understanding scale modeling and proportionality in architectural design.

topics.description: Identifying and analyzing structural elements in Lego Architecture models.

topics.title: Load Distribution and Stability
topics.description: Understanding load distribution and stability in architectural structures.

topics.description: Exploring different architectural styles and movements represented in Lego Architecture models.

topics.description: Using Lego bricks to represent different materials and textures in architectural designs.

topics.title: Sustainable Design Principles
topics.description: Applying sustainable design principles to Lego Architecture models.

topics.description: Exploring urban planning concepts through Lego City layouts and designs.

topics.title: Building Information Modeling (BIM)
topics.description: Introduction to Building Information Modeling (BIM) and its applications in architectural design.

topics.description: An examination of the Frank Lloyd Wright Lego architecture series.

topics.description: How Lego is used in architectural education.

topics.description: Applying Lego Serious Play to change management and organizational development initiatives.

topics.description: An understanding of the psychological principles and neuroscience behind the effectiveness of Lego Serious Play.

topics.description: How Lego Serious Play intersects with Agile Software Development methodologies.
